onyomiExamples.meaning: house for rent, rented house, renting a house

kunyomiExamples.meaning: to borrow, to have a loan, to rent, to hire

kunyomiExamples.example: 借りる時の地蔵顔、なす時の閻魔顔
kunyomiExamples.reading: かりるときのじぞうがおなすときのえんまがお
kunyomiExamples.meaning: people look friendly when they ask for a loan but not so much when they repay it, when borrowing (the money), the face of the (bodhisattva) Kshitigarbha; when returning it, the face of the (hell king) Yama
